body_html: I would never have been able to solve this problem if I hadn't found this issue. If tf.initialize_all_variables() doesn't initialize local variables, then there's either a bug in its implementation, a documentation issue (specifically, the word "all"), or both.

body: I would never have been able to solve this problem if I hadn't found this issue. If `tf.initialize_all_variables()` doesn't initialize local variables, then there's either a bug in its implementation, a documentation issue (specifically, the word "all"), or both.
